full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit tenders for the Phase II Helicopter Hangar Floor Coating project at the Victoria Base.

## Tender Details
- **Tender Reference Number**: WS4542908106-Doc4588264833
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4542908106
- **Publication Date**: 2024-05-15
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-25T14:00:00 (Expired)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-08-22
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

## Project Description
The project entails the removal and replacement of the existing helicopter maintenance-hangar concrete floor coating with a new epoxy floor coating system at the Victoria Base.

## Tendering Process
This is a competitive process, with tenders to be evaluated based on lowest price.

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact Wong, Summer (SPAC/PSPC) at summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
